{"id":1231727907,"question_id":3373,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1713062669,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"19 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1231727907/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Prime Difference","memory":"79.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maximumPrimeDifference(int[] nums) {\n        \n        int max = 0;\n        Integer last = null;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<nums.length; i++){\n            \n            if(isPrime(nums[i])){\n                \n                // System.out.println(nums[i]);\n                \n                if(last==null)\n                    last = i ;\n                else{\n                    max = Math.max(max, i-last);\n                    // last = i;\n                } \n                    \n                \n                \n            }\n        }\n        \n        return max;\n        \n    }\n    \n    \n      public boolean isPrime(int n)\n    {\n        if(n<2)\n        {\n            return false;\n        }\n        for(int i=2;i<=Math.sqrt(n);i++)\n        {\n            if(n%i==0)\n            {\n                return false;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-prime-difference","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
